scripts.build: mkdir -pv backup build/uploads && mv -v build/uploads backup/uploads && react-scripts build && mv -v backup/uploads build/uploads
scripts.pages: mv -v pages/index.html pages/top.html &&  cp -vr pages/* build/ && mv -v pages/top.html pages/index.html
scripts.owner: chcon -R -t httpd_sys_rw_content_t build/ && sudo chown -R nginx:nginx build/
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run pages && npm run owner
